intro: Lila never imagined that a storm would turn her into a heroine! One night of lightning and rain, the young girl's life suddenly changes completely!
description:
In this visual novel, you'll discover Lila and her new little big friends!

Lila never imagined that finding a shiny locket would change her life completely! Now, her room is filled with sparkly creatures, her desk comes to life (literally!), and a mysterious villain stalks her from the shadows.

With the help of the Sparks, mischievous and luminous beings, Lila must discover the secret of the locket before the whole city turns into electrical chaos. But… be careful! It's not easy being a heroine when even the machines have their own plan.

A magical story, full of action, humor, and friendship

Key features
· Wonderful characters:

Lila, a brave and curious protagonist.
The Sparks, adorable electric creatures with unique personalities.
The mysterious villain, a technological genius with dark intentions.

·Colorful backgrounds:

Vibrant worlds filled with magical details and interactive settings.
A city where electricity comes to life in unexpected ways.

· Immersive music:

A magical, dynamic soundtrack that reacts to the action.
Sparkling sound effects make every moment more special.

· Story with values and emotion:

An adventure about the power of friendship, courage and self-confidence.
Fun challenges that teach Lila to solve problems with ingenuity and teamwork.

· Guaranteed fun:

Comic moments and tangles full of spark.
Electrifying action scenes with dynamic combat and surprising powers.

Get ready for a burst of fun with Lila and her friends!
